name: Dynalist Simple Colors for default theme
description:
OVERVIEW Features of theme
-Hidden bulletpoints so its easier to look at doc
-Color Tags 1 and 2 is just a simple line stroke so its not distracting
-Color Tags 3,4,5,6 to seperate larger groups of content
-Specialized color URLs
-Specialzied color tags for use with default theme
-Easier to view image previews in markdown format

OTHER
Default settings here: https://i.imgur.com/uLRIlQB.png
You can find a full listing of how I use dynalist to take programming notes here https://forum.freecodecamp.org/t/how-i-take-my-notes-through-freecodecamp-using-dynalist/141348
